snippet: Alex Morgan strengthened her case for a starting role in this summer's London Olympics by scoring two late goals Saturday night to give the United States women's national team a 2-1 victory over New Zealand.
abstract: Alex Morgan strengthened her case for a starting role in this summer's London Olympics by scoring two late goals Saturday night to give the United States women's national team a 2-1 victory over New Zealand.
lead_paragraph: Alex Morgan strengthened her case for a starting role in this summer's London Olympics by scoring two late goals Saturday night to give the United States women's national team a 2-1 victory over New Zealand in Frisco, Tex.

headline.main: Morgan Scores Two as U.S. Women Win
